articles.author: Andrew Lawrence
articles.title: 'She was unapologetically her': Tori Bowie was a brilliant one of a kind - The Guardian
articles.description: In the aftermath of the sprinter’s death at the age of just 32, her USA teammate remembers a talented athlete who did things her own way
articles.content: The post-race glory photo-op is a time honored tradition, an occasion for athletes to get their hit of global adulation in case their compatriot fans forget to tune in to the medal ceremony. Tori Bow… [+5926 chars]

articles.author: Isaac Johnson
articles.title: Man City show they have shaken off Kevin De Bruyne theory in two matches - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester City are much better off when the superstar is on the pitch, but the Blues have shown they can still excel if he isn't.
articles.content:
Jack Grealish had previously said he had wanted to be the man to assist Erling Haalands record-breaking Premier League goal.
